mapper.select: select r.reportId,r.reportName,DATE_FORMAT(r.time,'%Y-%m-%d') datime,substr(r.carid,1,6) carido, substr(r.carid,16,18) caridt,r.phone,r.sex,r.age,p.department,d.doctorName,r.price,e.type,r.time,r.users,r.state,e.registeredid dregisteredid,d.doctorid ddoctorid,p.departmentId ddepartmentid from report r,doctor d,registeredtype e,departments p where r.doctor=d.doctorId and d.registeredid=e.registeredId and r.department=p.departmentId and r.state=1
mapper.update: update report set state = 0 where DATE_FORMAT(time,'%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(now(),"%Y-%m-%d") and state=1
